Models.name: BPS C5-17, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 17 output stackers (5 + 4 + 4 + 4), price on request

Models.name: BPS C5-21, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 21 output stackers (5 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4), price on request

Models.name: BPS C5-25, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 25 output stackers (5 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4), price on request

Models.name: BPS C5-1B, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 1 Bander Delivery Module (BDM), price on request

Standard Delivery Module.name: [BPSC5] Standard Delivery Module (SDM)
Standard Delivery Module.description: Upgrade of an existing system with an additional SDM (max. 6 modules can be connected to a system in total). One SDM contains 4 stackers for loose banknotes.

Bander Delivery Module.name: [BPSC5] Bander Delivery Module (BDM)
Bander Delivery Module.description: With the BDM, the functionality of online banding can be added to the BPS C5; one BDM is designated to one denomination (2 stackers working in tandem).

External display.name: [BPSC5] External display - Model: PD 7000
External display.description: TFT 7" LCD monitor, 20 characters by 3 lines, USB 2.0

GUI.name: 7" GUI
GUI.description: Optional 7" display with high resolution GUI (from R3.15 onwards), see price in Spare Parts Catalogue

Barcode reader.name: [BPSC5] Barcode reader
Barcode reader.description: Required for FDP and HDP processing

UPS.name: [BPSC5] Uninterrupted power supply (UPS)
UPS.description: Required for regions with frequent power failures

Upgrade Spares for BDM.name: [BPSC5] Image sensor PIS 7S
Upgrade Spares for BDM.description: Required parts for BPS C5 hardware releases <R3.7, for 220V (up to six modules) as well as 110V (up to two modules)

Upgrade Spares for BDM.name: [BPSC5] Image sensor PIS 7S and Panel element INL ASSY
Upgrade Spares for BDM.description: Required parts for BPS C5 hardware releases <R3.7 for 110V with more than 2 BDMs

Upgrade Spares for BDM.name: [BPSC5] Panel element INL ASSY
Upgrade Spares for BDM.description: Required parts for BPS C5 hardware releases = R3.7 and 110V with more than 2 BDMs

GUI mounting kit.name: [BPSC5] GUI mounting kit
GUI mounting kit.description: The mounting kit allows to attach the GUI to the BPS C5 enclosure (from R3.10 onwards)

Stand.name: [BPSC5] Stand
Stand.description: GUI table stand with flexible angle adjustment (only for high resolution GUI)

Bander output slider.name: [BPSC5] Bander output slider
Bander output slider.description: Bander output slider will slide the banded packets from bander output

Multi currency package.name: [BPSC5] Multi currency package 2-5 currency
Multi currency package.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations.

Multi currency package.name: [BPSC5] Multi currency package 6-10 currency
Multi currency package.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations. This multi currency package requires the installed package for 2.-5. currencies

Multi currency package.name: [BPSC5] Multi currency package 11-30 currency
Multi currency package.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations. This multi currency package requires the installed packages for 2.-5. and 6-10 currencies

Multi currency package.name: [BPSC5] Multi currency package > 30 currencies
Multi currency package.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Only applies to available and released adaptations. Up to 60 currencies are possible, depending on the complexity of the adaptations.

Multi currency package.name: [BPSC5] Mixed currency processing
Multi currency package.description: Processing of up to 10 currencies simultaneously if they are already installed in a multi-currency package.

Serial number reading.name: [BPSC5] Serial number reading
Serial number reading.description: Reads the serial number (SN) of banknotes incl. the possibility to either store it on the system or send the data as well as the image of the SN to a defined IP address or a connected USB stick.

Serial number reading.name: [BPSC5] Serial number reading, comparison and consolidation
Serial number reading.description: Reads both serial number (SN) of banknotes (OCR) and compares them. If they are different, i.e. a suspected composed note the banknote will be sent to reject.

Special features.name: [BPSC5] Special commercial security features
Special features.description: Some banknotes contain special features such as SICPATalk or have been inked by IBNS solutions. Many of such features can be detected, however require additional adaptation effort per currency.

Ticket reading.name: [BPSC5] Ticket reading
Ticket reading.description: Software function to read casino tickets by the sensor system and send data to a defined IP-address.

Deposit Processing.name: [BPSC5] Fast Deposit Processing (FDP)
Deposit Processing.description: Software function to increase efficiency by 1-step process: The deposit data are entered via barcode-reader directly at the system, banknotes verified and sorted in one run, rejects are processed offline to finally balance the deposit.

Deposit Processing.name: [BPSC5] Headercard Deposit processing (HDP)
Deposit Processing.description: Software function for increasing productivity by a 1-step process: Header cards and subsequent banknotes are recognized by the BPS C5 sensor; processing data are sent to a vault management SW such as Compass VMS on an external PC.

Sorting.name: [BPSC5] Dynamic sorting
Sorting.description: Banknotes are sorted dynamically into an available delivery stacker without singler stop: When a stacker is emptied, the sorting criteria for this stacker are reset, and this stacker is immediately available for any subsequent banknote with different sorting criteria.

Interfaces.name: [BPSC5] Video surveillance interface and SNTP
Interfaces.description: XML report to connect the processing data of a particular deposit with the video stream of the surveillance supplier

Interfaces.name: [BPSC5] BPS Config Optimizer
Interfaces.description: External application for customer PC (Windows) to change operation modes and machine configuration (e.g. reports, stacker capacity)

Activation.name: [BPSC5] Activation file creation
Activation.description: In case an activation file creation is required not in combination with a hardware or software order, this service fee will be charged
